page.title: 12TOURISM AND HISTORIC INN
page.content: {Horton Inn is an historic old coaching {inn }on Wimborne to Cranborne road, used to have own brewery. It has bars, restaurant & 5 bedrooms to let. Owners & 1 staff live in & there are 14 part-timers. Owners find it difficult to get staff due to isolation of area even though there is local unemploymemt. Trade is local & passing increased by summer visitors. There is a post box in car park wall. There are 3 cottages opposite, 1 empty but owned by young couple while doing major renovation, second cottage is occupied by a family & is being enlarged. Father commutes & children go to school out of area. Third cottage houses husband & wife & 1 child who have returned to village after years away.
